title: Maltese Flamingo
brief_description: A wonderfully wild’n’wacky ski film taking top honours at Vail’s ski film festival. Follow the adventures of 12 ski bums as they take on some of the greatest ski terrain in Europe and North America. Incredible ski action, great music gives `Maltese Flamingo’ the necessary punch to be one of the classic ski films of all time. Rated: G
